document_data.mainbody:
liver Quarlic was a Gur monster hunter from a tribe led by Ulma that traveled along the Sword Coast and Western Heartlands during the late 15 century DR.
Oliver was a tan-skinned Gur with a thin scar across the bridge of his nose, a brown beard, and a shaved head. He had a ring in his nostril and pierced ears. As an archer, he was dressed in a light set of leather armor and carried a longbow.
In the , Oliver Quarlics monster hunter tribe found itself targeted by the vampires of Baldurs Gate during the Absolute crisis when the Gurs camped in the Rivington district of Baldurs Gate, along with a small army of refugees displaced by the conflict. To the Gurs horror, the tribes children were abducted by the vampires under orders from Cazador Szarr. Olivers superstitious nature though that the gods had abandoned the tribe and that they were likely cursed, despite Ulmas assurance of it not being the case.
